result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bernadette A Rock

records.addlTxt: Defendant Bernadette A Rock in court with attorney Thomas J Duffy.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  14 CF 134 and 15 CM 225.  State recites plea agreement - moved to dismiss and read-in 14 CF 134.  Court grants motion case is dismissed and used as read-in.

Defendant Bernadette A Rock in court with attorney Thomas J Duffy.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  14 CF 134 and 15 CM 225.  State recites agreement - DE to plead to OWI 4th - count 2 to be dismissed and 15 CM 225 to be dismissed read-in   Probation 1 year -   Court makes stmt can not take plea unless she is ready to go to jail today - will pick another day for plea.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 14, 2018 at 08:45 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 6, 2018 at 01:45 pm.

Defendant Bernadette A Rock in court with attorney Thomas J Duffy.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  15CM225 and 14 CF134.  Atty Duffy addressed the court requests disposition be done in Bayfield county.  Court makes stmt.  State makes stmt.  Judge will appear via video  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 6, 2018 at 01:45 pm.

Judge Anderson in Bayfield County Courtroom by video, Defendant Bernadette A Rock in Bayfield County courttoom  with her Attorney Thomas J Duffy appearing in Sawyer County, Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin in Sawyer County.
Atty Duffy states he just received this case and requests more time.  Bond continues.  Status conference scheduled for July 11, 2018 at 09:20 am.

Defendant Bernadette A Rock in court with attorney Thomas J Duffy. Bruce Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  2 cases.  Atty Duffy makes stmt.  Bond will continue.  Status conference scheduled for June 20, 2018 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on May 25, 2018 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Bernadette A Rock in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 15 CM 225.  DE states PD's office has not obtained an attorney for her.  Atty McL states he would take it if there is not a conflict.  Court makes stmt may be a conflict.  State makes further stmt.  Court if no PD then court will appoint an atty for her.  Status conference scheduled for May 25, 2018 at 01:15 pm.  Review scheduled for May 16, 2018 at 08:00 am.
DE called to verify she was to appear in Sawyer County for the next hearing (notice was inaccurate)
Status conference on April 25, 2018 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Bernadette A Rock in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  14 CF 134 and 15 CM 225.  Court addressed parties -   DE states an atty has not appointed an attorney yet.  Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2018 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Bernadette A Rock
Current: 37335 WATER TOWER ROAD, Bayfield, WI 54814 United States  (Effective: 04-06-2018)
Prior: 37315 Community Rd #11, Bayfield, WI 54814

CBS $2500  COMBINED BOND (15CM225 and 14CF134)    Standard STOP Program Conditions:
Defendant shall not possess any dangerous weapons.
Defendant shall not possess or consume alcoholic beverages or illegal drugs.
Defendant shall not drive without a valid drivers license.
Defendant is ordered to report to Health and Human Services at 10610 Main Street, Hayward, WI within 48 hours (excluding weekends and holidays) upon release from custody to schedule an intake with a stop case manager (715-638-3317) for the purpose of setting up a procedure to monitor compliance with the bond provisions.  Failure to appear may result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, a bond modification hearing, possible bail jumping charges and / or forfeiture of any bond deposit.

Defendant shall not be on the premises of any establishment that serves alcohol by the drink.

Defendant Bernadette A Rock in court, in custody appears by video.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Warrant quashed.    Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.  Court enters NG Plea.   CBS $2500  COMBINED BOND (15CM225 and 14CF134)    Standard STOP Program Conditions:

Defendant shall not drive without a valid drivers license.
Defendant is ordered to report to Health and Human Services at 10610 Main Street, Hayward, WI within 48 hours (excluding weekends and holidays) upon release from custody to schedule an intake with a stop case manager (715-638-3317) for the purpose of setting up a procedure to monitor compliance with the bond provisions.  Failure to appear may result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, a bond modification hearing, possible bail jumping charges and / or forfeiture of any bond deposit.

Defendant shall not be on the premises of any establishment that serves alcohol by the drink.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 12, 2018 at 08:30 am.
